resources.string: Select the crop that you have to check
There are five stages involved for cotton to be harvested.There is a possibility of pest attack in any of those stages.To know more,click next
There are five stages involved for rice_p to be harvested.There is a possibility of pest attack in any of those stages.To know more,click next
